title: 2022 Honda Navi: A Scooter That’s a Wee Bit of Fun
sub_head: With an MSRP of only $1,807, the little Honda Navi employs a time-honored strategy of being both cheap and cool. Dan Neil did his best to look tough astride its petite body.
body:
THERE IS AN ETIQUETTE among moto riders: When they see one another on the road, they exchange a slight but meaningful wave with the left hand—something to the effect of yo.
When I saw the dude on the full-dresser Harley-Davidson Electra Glide at the intersection—his lady enthroned on the back, his face covered with a grinning-skull kerchief—I sensed an approaching social dilemma. In the presence of what appeared to be Darth Vader on prom night, the 2022 Honda Navi mini motorcycle I was riding looked trifling and toylike. I fretted, would the Harley rider acknowledge anyone so feebly mounted?
